snp4.15:3.4: _Osita_ (and _osāna_ in the next line) convey both “occupy” and “end” in the sense of a place of rest at the end of a journey.
snp4.15:6.1: Agreeing with Norman that this line is likely a reciter’s remark. However, I take _tattha_ as the locative of reference. “That topic” is the extraction of the dart, for which the remainder of the sutta gives practical guidelines.
